question: Which among the following places of Uttar Pradesh is going to have the status of ‘national importance’ by the Archaeological Survey of India?
explanation: Sadikpur Sinauli of Uttar Pradesh is going to have the status of ‘national importance’ by the Archaeological Survey of India. It is located in the Baghpat district. It was the largest necropolis of the Late Harappan period (Early 2nd millennium BCE).
